title: Crime Stories with Nancy Grace
overview: Nancy Grace is an award-winning and respected legal commentator, victims' rights advocate, broadcast personality, and The New York Times bestselling author of four books. Grace has dedicated her life to fighting for the rights of victims of crime and their families. Now, the outspoken and passionate former prosecutor explores the inside stories of true crimes — ripped from today's headlines — as well as cold cases waiting for new leads. Grace aims to bring closure and justice to families still grappling with the pain of unresolved tragedies. New one-hour episodes air daily at 6PM ET, only on Merit Street.
